name: Black Silk abaca bow
description:
One of my best selling hats, this Leighanne Michelle headpiece is a perfect addition to your hat collection.  The oversized bow elegantly sits up high and is accentuated by the sheer crinoline incorporated into the bow shape.

A must have shape for races, cocktails, parties etc. Very elegant and versatile piece.

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Bridal headpiece with ostrich feathers
description:
This Leighanne Michelle bridal design is a beautiful piece for your special day.  Handcrafted with ivory duchess silk satin and layered with ivory lace and tulle, it has then been hand beaded with genuine Swarovski Elements in crystal cream pearls and  moonlight and crystal beads.  The softening effect of the ostrich feathers finishes the piece.  Attaches with comb and light and easy to wear.  Can be combined with veil (sold separately).  

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Bridal Teardrop headpiece in Ivory and Cream
description:
Signature teardrop shape, this Leighanne Michelle bridal design is a beautiful piece for your special day.  Handcrafted with ivory duchess silk satin and layered with ivory lace and tulle, it has then been hand beaded with genuine Swarovski Elements in crystal cream pearls and  moonlight and crystal beads.  The softening effect of the ostrich feathers finishes the piece.  Attaches with comb and light and easy to wear.  Can be combined with veil (sold separately).  

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Beret
description:
Hats by Leighanne Michelle beret in jacquard fabric and trimmed with bow.  Great easy to wear everyday style.

Size: Medium. Free delivery in Australia.

name: Beautiful Crystal motif
description: Beautiful Crystal motif, perfect for a variety of sewing projects.

name: Crystal motif "v" shaped
description: Crystal motif "v" shaped. A lovely motif suitable for a variety of sewing projects.

name: Crystal Motif in diamond pattern
description: Crystal Motif in diamond pattern. Perfect for sewing projects, millinery and bridal work.

name: Vintage Diamante Brooch
description: Beautiful bow shaped vintage diamante brooch.

name: Blue and pink Splendour Brooch
description: This gorgeous Splendour Brooch is a colourful festive brooch perfect for any occasion requiring that extra sparkle!

name: Swarovski Crystal Motif
description: Swarovski Crystal Motif - perfect for your sewing projects.

name: Orange and Pink Crystal Splendour Brooch
description: This gorgeous Splendour Brooch is a colourful festive brooch perfect for any occasion requiring that extra sparkle!

name: Hat pin
description: Black and pink hat pin

name: Theatrical piece - Somewhere in Paris
description:
This wirework piece is handcrafted by Leighanne Michelle.  It combines crystals, lace and distressed pink organza for a theatrical effect.  Perfect as a fairy princess or pink powder puff queen.  Its a little bit of magic in this crazy world! Some crystals are genuine Swarovski Elements and some are vintage pieces (one off's)

Add to your hat collection today!  Attaches with hat elastic and small rings for bobby pins.  Very secure and soft to wear.

name: Silky tulle bridal veil in Champagne
description:
Veil hand crafted by Leighanne Michelle, this silky tulle veil in Champagne is double layered (one layer shorter than the other). It is designed to be worn draping from top of head or from back of head. The shorter layer can cover the face and then be easily turned back. Can be worn with bridal headpiece (sold separately) and easily removed when desired. Attaches with large clear plastic comb that is well hidden under the hair. It sits elegantly and is not too puffy.

This silky tulle fabric is very silky (mimics silk tulle, without the cost of silk). It is superb quality and soft and light to touch.     Note: this fabric is fragile and must be treated with care so as not to put holes in it.

name: Milky Tulle Bridal Veil
description:
Veil hand crafted by Leighanne Michelle, this milky tulle veil is one layered, designed to be worn draping from top of head or from back of head.  It falls to above knee length.  Ideal veil for bride who doesn't want her face to be covered.  Can be worn with bridal headpiece (sold separately) and easily removed when desired. Attaches with simple metal comb that is well hidden under the hair.

This milky tulle fabric is close to ivory and is superb quality with a shiny finish.  Note: this fabric is fragile and must be treated with care so as not to put holes in it.

name: Australian Bush Flower necklace and earrings set
description: A beautiful floral necklace with earrings set.  A fresh design combining shell flower and crystals.  A gorgeous and unique creation by Marg Sandy, influenced by the Australian bush.  Go on...Treat yourself!

name: Blue eucalyptus necklace
description: A stunning design by Marg Sandy, this statement piece captures the Australian Bush, a topic of great inspiration to Marg.  This necklace will certainly dress up an outfit where it will surely be the centrepiece.  It reminds me of summer in Australia and cool eucalyptus vibe.

name: Australian Bush necklace and earring set
description: Another stunning design by Marg Sandy.  Influenced by the Australian Bush, Marg has captured the relaxed feeling of a gum leaf with burgundy gum nut.  A lovely piece perfect as a gift for someone overseas or closer to home.

name: Snow and Ice Crisp Necklace
description: A stunning necklace and earring set handcrafted by Marg Sandy.  I adore these designs and I hope you do too.  This set is very versatile, great for the office or for a special evening occasion.  A perfect gift for someone you love.

name: Crystal cream pearl and crystal bead tiara
description:
Handcrafted crystal cream pearl and crystal bead tiara by Hats by Leighanne Michelle.  This silver plated wire tiara has been crafted with genuine Swarovski Elements for that extra sparkle and style. Combines well with veil which can be removed for the evening.

Veil sold separately.

name: Silver and crystal flower headpiece
description:
An Elegance by Carbonneau piece, this flower headpiece is covered with small crystals adding that certain sparkle to your special day.  Would look amazing with wedding veil which can be removed after the ceremony for the evening.

One size fits most. Veil sold separately.

name: Silver and pearl crystal comb
description: Small comb with silver and pearls, by Elegance by Carbonneau. A beautiful way to add some sparkle to your special occasion.

name: Crystal Side comb with Crystal AB detail
description: This exciting design combines classic crystal and silver with small colour crystal aurora borealis detail. By Elegance by Carbonneau, a lovely piece with added character for your special day.

name: Clear and Crystal Silver side comb
description: Clear and crystal beads in flower formation.  By Elegance by Carbonneau, a stunning side comb that completes your outfit for your special day.

name: Crystal Side comb
description: Beautiful crystal side comb.  Interesting intricate design for the modern bride.  Made by Elegance by Carbonneau.

name: Vintage Style Side comb
description: Beautiful and elegant vintage style side comb by Elegance by Carbonneau.  Perfect for bridal and other special occasions. Crystal details and silver base. Just stunning!

name: Gold detail Bridal comb with flowers
description: Beautiful gold coloured flowers, detailed with crystals and pearls.  This Elegance by Carbonneau piece is a luxurious comb that will bring that extra style and sparkle to your special day.

name: Pearl and Crystal comb
description: This small comb by Elegance by Carbonneau is a lovely addition to your hairstyle.  Cream pearls, crystals and gold detail make it a beautiful piece to finish your outfit.

name: Silver Swarovski Bridal Comb
description: By Elegance by Carbonneau, this stunning comb is perfect for brides and special occasions.  Set with large Swarovski crystals and elegant leaf pattern.

description:

description:
Hat Block Hire Day
See www.leighannemichelle.com.au homepage for terms and conditions.  
Access from 9am - 4pm. 
Yearly fee $40
Session fee $30

name: Gift Certificate for Leighanne Michelle Millinery
description:
Purchase a gift certificate of millinery for someone you love.  Pick an amount from $50, $100, $200 and $300 and let them select a hat or headpiece or jewellery of their choice.  Valid for one year from the date of purchase, this is unique gift for someone special who appreciates luxury, style and elegance in headwear and beautiful pieces.

Only for ready to wear hats, not bespoke items.  Can be claimed on line for any item listed with "voucher code" on back of voucher.  Stock updated frequently.

name: Joan
description:
Silk satin hat in the percher style with lace and feather trim.  This hat is soft and luxurious and fun!

One size fits most.

Attaches with hat elastic.

name: Pink Fiesta
description:
This assortment of crazy feathers is the perfect compliment to this years prints and colour.  Step out in pink fiesta.

Attaches with hat elastic.

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Somewhere in Paris Collection "Mimi"
description:
Gorgeous bronze sequin hat with handcrafted lily with Swarovski beaded centre and curled crystal trimmed feathers. Perfect for special occasions and spring racing.

One size fits most.

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Somewhere in Paris Collection "Adrienne"
description:
This one is for the fashion forward.  Coral Boater with bow and biot thistle trim.  This hat sits up high on the head, tipped slightly to the right or left.  This style is making a welcome comeback and evokes a relaxed Spring Summer feeling, whether your at the races, or paddling down the river or enjoying a festive picnic.  And yes ladies, it provides shade! Perfect for warm days.

Size 22 1/2 inch but sits high so will fit most people.

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Somewhere in Paris Collection "Francine"
description:
Gold coloured headband trimmed with duchess silk satin bright red handcrafted rose.  The rose has a Swarovski crystal beaded centre and is surrounded by elegant coque feathers and black and gold crinoline.  It adds dimension but still light and sheer.

Add a touch of drama with this elegant piece.

One size fits most.

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Somewhere in Paris Collection "Lucy"
description:
Exquisite green silk dupion hand crafted flower, trimmed with matching Swarovski crystal centre and tassles.  Sits nestled in sculptural straw and sits on comfortable bandeau.

One size fits most. 

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Black silk abaca swirl hat
description:
Black silk abaca swirl.  3D shape that goes perfectly with any colour outfit.

Attaches with hat elastic.

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Somewhere in Paris "Audrey"
description:
Beige straw hat with sculptural feature wave and curled ostrich spines, trimmed with elaborate beige beaded lace and hand crafted silk flower in soft dusty deep pink.  Fully lined for maximum wear time and comfort.  Attaches with hat elastic.

Size: 22 1/2 inch (57 cm)

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Somewhere in Paris "Sandrine"
description:
Sculptured sinamay hat in neutral colours.  Simplicity and style.

One size fits all.

Attaches with hat elastic.

Free delivery in Australia

name: Somewhere in Paris "Collette"
description:
For the theatrical soul, this wirework piece has an abundance of feathers and grey tulle.  Attaches with comb and headband.

One size fits most.

Free delivery in Australia

name: Somewhere in Paris "Fleur"
description:
Gorgeous hat with an abundance of flowers, topped off with candy pink swirl.

One size fits all. Attaches with hat elastic.

Free delivery in Australia.

name: Somewhere in Paris Collection "Cleo"
description:
Steel grey beret style hat with wirework trim. 
Also trimmed with lilac and plum handcrafted flowers and spikey biot flowers.  Plum veiling finishes the piece.

One size fits most. Attaches with hat elastic and comb.

name: Somewhere in Paris Collection "Marie"
description: Marie is a distinctive hat designed with the women of the Moulin Rouge in mind.   The black sinamay shape is reminiscent of French hat design with a modern twist.  To keep it asymmetrical, two ostrich quills and a hand made silk flower in pink sits gracefully to one side.  A sneaky blush of distressed organza also reaches out from the back in keeping with the Paris theme.  Attaches with hat elastic, this statement piece is for those ladies who celebrate a sense of occasion with a great hat! One size fits most.
